page.title: 05Andrew's Fire Station Visit
page.content: On Wednesday we went to the Fire Station and the Firemen showed us inside of the{fire engine}and Anthony drived. I was on a seat. Then the fireman said we had to get out and he put his{breathing apparatus}on and his gas mask and he let us all have a go at doing it. After that he got a trumpet out and when it was my turn I blowed it dead loud and the fireman said I must of had a lot of breath. The the fireman got a small black mat out and he put it under the fire engine and a fireman drove the fire engine onto it. Then the fireman blew it up with an oblong thing and it lifted the fire engine up and we saw underneath.Then we saw the hose get put on and the fireman let us have a go. Then another fireman got the{Simon {Snorkel}out and one of the firemen went up in it. It was the best.
